Class Crop

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
      • game.Crop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.GroundInterface

    public class Crop
extends edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Ground
    A Ground subclass that can be harvested when ripe into a Food item. Turns ripe after 20 turns if not fertilized.
    Author:
    Sravan
